Text: A track piece that goes straight. It can be changed to a one-way signal using the toggle when clicked on. It creates a track section between one-way tracks that allows a single train to be on it (indicated by the colors).

Will inform trains that they can only pass through the green side. It can be switched back to a straight track by using the toggle when clicking on it. Creates a track section between one-ways that allows a single train to be on it (indicated by the colors).
Beavers can cross the tracks here. Collision will not be implemented as performance will suffer too much.
That train is approaching very fast.
A track that allows trains to ascend and descend.
Is the train not too heavy?
A track piece that goes around a corner.
It might be a little tight.
A track piece that goes around a larger corner.
Where will those paths lead to?
A railroad crossing in the shape of an X for trains.
A railroad crossing in the shape of an X.
I just cannot choose where to go...
A switch in the form of an R for trains.
Allows for the transportation of goods by trains. A good can either be sent or received at a station. Goods received will only be moved to storages that are set to obtain.
Look at all the goods it can hold.
This station allows beavers to get on the train and travel to another station that is connected to it.
When enabled, it will ONLY allow beavers to access passenger stations that have this setting enabled and are located in other districts.
There are currently no passengers waiting.
Trains can wait here when they have nothing to do. This prevents trains from occupying the tracks. Trains cannot pathfind over this, so make sure it's not in any crucial paths.
This is where trains are born.
Are you sure you want to destroy this train?
Distribution configured for sending according to distribution settings.
Distribution set to receiving by distribution settings.
Completely disable the distribution of this product at this station.
The station can send this good to another station. The maximum amount that can be inside the station is determined by the amount on the right.
The station can receive goods that are sent from other stations. The maximum amount that can be inside the station is determined by the amount to the right.
Decrease the maximum amount that can be inside the station. A click is -1 and holding shift is -10. The maximum capacity is 200.
Increase the maximum amount of goods.
Increase the maximum amount that can be inside the station. Click is +1 and holding shift is +10. Max capacity is 200.
Only 1 Train Yard can be built.
You need to unlock {0} to build {1}.
The station is not connected to any other station.
